channel.title: [PI] Weapon Damages
channel.description: I cant find them, like whip is overpowered, hits 50s, i want it to hit like 40s max, and i cant find anything, only whip spec, emote, gfx and shit... i cant change bonus's because its same as rs 82.0, does anyone know where the weapon damges are, not special attack damages, normal damages.

item.title: [PI] Weapon Damages
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Just change the bonuses, the second to last number on item.cfg for the whip is the strength bonus, if you change that to a lower number, you’ll hit less.

Who cares if the runescape bonus is 82? :L

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Weapon Damages
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

Is your str insanely high in item.cfg?

Read full topic
